Property.name: staging_base_directory

Property.name: staging_remote_agent
Property.Description: Agent which will be used for staging

Property.name: staging_remote_directory
Property.Description: Base directory on the staging server where package should be downloaded to

Property.name: oracle_home
Property.Description: Oracle Home directory

Property.name: java_options
Property.Description: Java Options

Property.Description: Port number which should be used to connect

Property.Description: Username used to authenticate with WebLogic

Property.Description: Password used to authenticate with WebLogic

Property.Description: Connection protocol to connect WLST to server

Property.Description: Script to use to start up the Domain Administration Server

Property.Description: Windows Service name of Administration Server

Property.Description: IP or hostname of the Node Manager

Property.Description: Port number used to connect to the Node Manager

Property.Description: Script to use to shutdown the Node Manager
